blog.description: Sky/fem/bi/she,her. This blog is a mess of fandoms and content. I'm currently working on a long-running Borderlands fanfiction about my OC Skies which updates every Sunday. I also write a Johnny the Homicidal Maniac and Invader Zim crossover fic called Fanatics, which is currently on extended hiatus while I upload the ton of past chapters onto my Ao3. And I draw sometimes.

visits since June 7th, 2016

summary: “oh my god you’re Y/N!” the guy in the spider suit said when he saw you.  the Entire Team Cap turned to you. Sam...
caption:
“oh my god you’re Y/N!” the guy in the spider suit said when he saw you.

the Entire Team Cap turned to you. Sam snickered, “looks like you got an admirer Y/N.” 

“are you kidding?! Y/N’s the best! how can you not love her!” Peter said.

“okay, Peter, you gotta work on your game face.” Tony sighed.

“oh, right, sorry Mr. Stark.”

title: Only friends (4/7)  [Peter Parker x Reader]
body:
Summary: Peter Parker was many things, but Y/N didn’t expected him to be the love of her life (fluff)

Words: 1600 +/-

Warnings: swear words

*Prologue* *Part 1* *Part 2* *Part 3*  *Part 5*  *Part 6*

Peter Parker was my boyfriend …. kind of.

It would be strange to simply announce that we were dating on Monday, so we planned a way for our friends to find out about us.

We had bought some discreet little things for couples, like bracelets, cell phone plugs and headphones. The first person to notice our bracelets was Ned, of course. That boy has eagle eyes.

We were in math class when he switched his gaze between me and Peter, who were concentrating on the demon’s exercise the teacher had been through. He nudged MJ and whispered something in her ear, and even without hearing, I knew it was about us.

He stood quietly, glancing at us both, his curiosity seemed to increase even more when Parker came too close, whispering something in my ear about class. Since he knew Ned was looking, just like MJ, he slid his nose lightly on my cheek before moving away, and shit, I wasn’t expecting it. It was inevitable not to feel a shiver running through my spine.

On Tuesday, we were using the cell phone plugs. MJ noticed at lunch. We were talking about the last episode of Lucifer when Peter took his cell phone to read some news about the show, and I got my cell phone to read too, that’s when she decided to ask.

“Are you sure you are not dating?”

“We are sure.” I said, eating the candy that Peter gave into my mouth.

“Then why are you using double accessories?” Half the little table looked in our direction, waiting for the answer, including Flash, who had arrived a few minutes ago.

“Oh … yeah …” I curled up a bit because I knew I’d leave MJ with a flea behind her ear.

“It was on sale; take two for the price of one. So Y/N bought it and gave me one.” Peter said,without taking his eyes from his phone.

On Wednesday, someone announced that he would hold a party on Saturday to commemorate the victory of the basketball team and I knew that Flash would try to call me again to go, so Peter decided we would make our friends discover in that day. 

Instead of running off to buy our cookie, he whispered in my ear that he would wait behind the bleachers on the court, so we could spend some time alone. I knew that Ned had heard because he kept watching us. I tried to disguise it and nodded. 

“Let’s go?” Ned asked.

“Hm? Oh … I have to go to the teachers’ room … You know I’m bad at chemistry, I’m going to look for the teacher to see if she can help me, maybe tell me a tutor or something.”

"Oh, of course. It’s all right. I’ll wait for you at the table.” I nodded, leaving the room. Ned waited for me to leave the room to follow me; when I got on the court, I almost jumped when Peter pulled me by the wrist and pressed me to the wall, making our bodies stick together. I could smell the delicious chocolate that came from him.

“Ned sucks at following people.” He whispered close to my lips. "I see him standing there near the locker room, he’s looking here … Hm … I really can … You know …?”

“Kiss me?” I asked quietly, and he nodded. Fuck, what a strange situation. Having him so close to me that way and knowing what would happen next, I felt my heart race. “Yes.”

“If you want, we can only act … There is an angle that looks … “ He stopped talking as soon as I kissed him.

When I heard people talking about how they felt in the clouds kissing someone they liked, I thought it was a litany of romantic people, but at that moment, as I closed my eyes to experience the kiss, I felt a strange numbness in my legs, as if I was really floating. 

If I didn’t feel anything for him, why did I feel that way about our kiss?

I stared at his face as I opened my eyes. He kept his mouth open, letting out his breath with a little difficulty. His face was so handsome that I wanted to kiss him completely, and so I did. At that moment, I even forgot that Ned was there and that he was the reason for it all. Peter laughed as he felt my lips trailing down his neck in a calm, non-malicious way. 

It was when I realized the situation and I was bewildered for a few seconds, not knowing what to do, because it seemed that the control I had had escaped my fingers.

“I think we’re great actors.” Peter whispered still with his eyes closed. We stayed a little like that as I tried to calm my heart.

As I said, I had kissed only one person in my life, and it wasn’t a very good experience, and for that reason, I kept in my head that all kisses would be disgusting like that, but no. His lips tasted of mint, since he was addicted to those gums, and my God, thank you, sir, for not being a frilly kiss.

“We should win an Oscar.” I said with a low laugh, even though I felt my heart might come out of my mouth at any moment.

It’s normal for a kiss to cause this in people, right?

“Pete …”

“Hm?”

“Is it normal for people’s hearts to beat quickly after a kiss?” He didn’t say anything at that moment, just took my hand and carried it to his chest, making me feel his heart, which looked like a little animal caged in the chest.

"Considering mine is too, I think so.Let’s go to the cafeteria, I’m sure Ned’s going to rub it in our face, I saw he recording. He is a traitor indeed.” He took my hand and pulled me away. 

We continued hand in hand as we walked the corridors, the students weren’t surprised, since we used to do that everyday. It wasn’t long before we arrived at the table, Ned was sitting there talking to MJ. 

We sat there and Peter opened his backpack and took out some chips from there, we began to eat while he took his cell phone from his pocket and stretched an earphone in my direction. As always, he laid his head on my shoulder and I brought my finger to his lips, wiping them, since they were dirty, making him smile with the act.

"Are you sure you’re not dating yet?”

“We have, yes, why?” I asked, without much effort.

 "And best friends kiss each other in the mouth?“

“What you mean?” Peter asked, pausing the song while Ned reached for his cell phone in his pocket as planned.

I wanted to smile because our plan was working, our friends were really believing. He approached it to our faces, where we could see each other perfectly, so he pressed play and everyone’s eyes widened, including Flash’s who was sitting in front of us. Everyone looked surprised by the scene.

"Where did you get that? Wait! Did you follow us?”

"Sorry, I was just curious. You can see the way you look at each other, I thought you were being stupid for not seeing it. But apparently, you have seen, and you have seen it very well.” 

I felt my cheeks warm.

"Okay, you were right, we are dating. We have not talked before because no one here has anything to do with it.” Peter said

"Oh, so it was true,” Flash whispered. “They told me you were together, but I did not believe it … I’m sorry for being pushy, I thought Y/N was single.”

"Oh, it’s okay, Flash.” Parker smiled. "You had no way of knowing, after all.”

“Well, I’ll be going. Congratulations to you.” He said and left. Everyone began to get up and leave the table when the signal hit.

I should be glad that I was “free” from Flash, right? But I felt bad for fooling everyone.

“Why do you look sad?” Peter asked after everyone left.

"I feel bad for fooling everyone. I’m a lousy friend.”

"Sometimes, love, lying is better than telling the truth. You wanted a way to get him out of your foot without hurting him, didn’t you?” I nodded. “Then, he’s going to be a little sad, but if you had said in all letters that you didn’t want to go out with him, he would be much more hurt, wouldn’t he?”

“Maybe … I guess I should have been honest with him from the start.”

“Are you, like, sorry for doing this?”

“Yes. I think I am.”

"Even … for kissing me?”

“What? Kissing was good, I just … “I widened my eyes when I realized what I was saying, hearing a giggle come from his handsome lips. He leaned in a little and left a kiss on my lips before he got up.

"Come on, class will start, and I don’t want to get on my knees in the hallway for being late again.” I took his hand, and still feeling a warm warmth on my lips, we went to attend physics class.

But I still had one doubt that didn’t want to leave my mind.

If it was a lie, why was my heart pounding for real?

Taglist: @tokoyamisstuff, @imrllybored, @xxxxdelenaxxxx, @saturnspiderman

send me an ask or message if you want to be on my taglist and which character you want (Bucky, Peter, Avengers, all of them…)

leave a comment on this post if you’d like to be tagged ONLY in this fic series

A/N: hmmm lies, lies

“Yes. I think I am.”

"Even … for kissing me?”

“What? Kissing was good, I just … “I widened my eyes when I realized what I was saying, hearing a giggle come from his handsome lips. He leaned in a little and left a kiss on my lips before he got up.

"Come on, class will start, and I don’t want to get on my knees in the hallway for being late again.” I took his hand, and still feeling a warm warmth on my lips, we went to attend physics class.

But I still had one doubt that didn’t want to leave my mind.

If it was a lie, why was my heart pounding for real?

Taglist: @tokoyamisstuff, @imrllybored, @xxxxdelenaxxxx, @saturnspiderman

A/N: hmmm lies, lies
trail.content:
Summary: Peter Parker was many things, but Y/N didn’t expected him to be the love of her life (fluff)

Words: 1600 +/-

Warnings: swear words

*Prologue* *Part 1* *Part 2* *Part 3*  *Part 5*  *Part 6*

Peter Parker was my boyfriend …. kind of.

It would be strange to simply announce that we were dating on Monday, so we planned a way for our friends to find out about us.

We had bought some discreet little things for couples, like bracelets, cell phone plugs and headphones. The first person to notice our bracelets was Ned, of course. That boy has eagle eyes.

We were in math class when he switched his gaze between me and Peter, who were concentrating on the demon’s exercise the teacher had been through. He nudged MJ and whispered something in her ear, and even without hearing, I knew it was about us.

He stood quietly, glancing at us both, his curiosity seemed to increase even more when Parker came too close, whispering something in my ear about class. Since he knew Ned was looking, just like MJ, he slid his nose lightly on my cheek before moving away, and shit, I wasn’t expecting it. It was inevitable not to feel a shiver running through my spine.

On Tuesday, we were using the cell phone plugs. MJ noticed at lunch. We were talking about the last episode of Lucifer when Peter took his cell phone to read some news about the show, and I got my cell phone to read too, that’s when she decided to ask.

“Are you sure you are not dating?”

“We are sure.” I said, eating the candy that Peter gave into my mouth.

“Then why are you using double accessories?” Half the little table looked in our direction, waiting for the answer, including Flash, who had arrived a few minutes ago.

“Oh … yeah …” I curled up a bit because I knew I’d leave MJ with a flea behind her ear.

“It was on sale; take two for the price of one. So Y/N bought it and gave me one.” Peter said,without taking his eyes from his phone.

On Wednesday, someone announced that he would hold a party on Saturday to commemorate the victory of the basketball team and I knew that Flash would try to call me again to go, so Peter decided we would make our friends discover in that day. 

Instead of running off to buy our cookie, he whispered in my ear that he would wait behind the bleachers on the court, so we could spend some time alone. I knew that Ned had heard because he kept watching us. I tried to disguise it and nodded. 

“Let’s go?” Ned asked.

“Hm? Oh … I have to go to the teachers’ room … You know I’m bad at chemistry, I’m going to look for the teacher to see if she can help me, maybe tell me a tutor or something.”

"Oh, of course. It’s all right. I’ll wait for you at the table.” I nodded, leaving the room. Ned waited for me to leave the room to follow me; when I got on the court, I almost jumped when Peter pulled me by the wrist and pressed me to the wall, making our bodies stick together. I could smell the delicious chocolate that came from him.

“Ned sucks at following people.” He whispered close to my lips. "I see him standing there near the locker room, he’s looking here … Hm … I really can … You know …?”

“Kiss me?” I asked quietly, and he nodded. Fuck, what a strange situation. Having him so close to me that way and knowing what would happen next, I felt my heart race. “Yes.”

“If you want, we can only act … There is an angle that looks … “ He stopped talking as soon as I kissed him.

When I heard people talking about how they felt in the clouds kissing someone they liked, I thought it was a litany of romantic people, but at that moment, as I closed my eyes to experience the kiss, I felt a strange numbness in my legs, as if I was really floating. 

If I didn’t feel anything for him, why did I feel that way about our kiss?

I stared at his face as I opened my eyes. He kept his mouth open, letting out his breath with a little difficulty. His face was so handsome that I wanted to kiss him completely, and so I did. At that moment, I even forgot that Ned was there and that he was the reason for it all. Peter laughed as he felt my lips trailing down his neck in a calm, non-malicious way. 

It was when I realized the situation and I was bewildered for a few seconds, not knowing what to do, because it seemed that the control I had had escaped my fingers.

“I think we’re great actors.” Peter whispered still with his eyes closed. We stayed a little like that as I tried to calm my heart.

As I said, I had kissed only one person in my life, and it wasn’t a very good experience, and for that reason, I kept in my head that all kisses would be disgusting like that, but no. His lips tasted of mint, since he was addicted to those gums, and my God, thank you, sir, for not being a frilly kiss.

“We should win an Oscar.” I said with a low laugh, even though I felt my heart might come out of my mouth at any moment.

It’s normal for a kiss to cause this in people, right?

“Pete …”

“Hm?”

“Is it normal for people’s hearts to beat quickly after a kiss?” He didn’t say anything at that moment, just took my hand and carried it to his chest, making me feel his heart, which looked like a little animal caged in the chest.

"Considering mine is too, I think so.Let’s go to the cafeteria, I’m sure Ned’s going to rub it in our face, I saw he recording. He is a traitor indeed.” He took my hand and pulled me away. 

We continued hand in hand as we walked the corridors, the students weren’t surprised, since we used to do that everyday. It wasn’t long before we arrived at the table, Ned was sitting there talking to MJ. 

We sat there and Peter opened his backpack and took out some chips from there, we began to eat while he took his cell phone from his pocket and stretched an earphone in my direction. As always, he laid his head on my shoulder and I brought my finger to his lips, wiping them, since they were dirty, making him smile with the act.

"Are you sure you’re not dating yet?”

“We have, yes, why?” I asked, without much effort.

 "And best friends kiss each other in the mouth?“

“What you mean?” Peter asked, pausing the song while Ned reached for his cell phone in his pocket as planned.

I wanted to smile because our plan was working, our friends were really believing. He approached it to our faces, where we could see each other perfectly, so he pressed play and everyone’s eyes widened, including Flash’s who was sitting in front of us. Everyone looked surprised by the scene.

"Where did you get that? Wait! Did you follow us?”

"Sorry, I was just curious. You can see the way you look at each other, I thought you were being stupid for not seeing it. But apparently, you have seen, and you have seen it very well.” 

I felt my cheeks warm.

"Okay, you were right, we are dating. We have not talked before because no one here has anything to do with it.” Peter said

"Oh, so it was true,” Flash whispered. “They told me you were together, but I did not believe it … I’m sorry for being pushy, I thought Y/N was single.”

"Oh, it’s okay, Flash.” Parker smiled. "You had no way of knowing, after all.”

“Well, I’ll be going. Congratulations to you.” He said and left. Everyone began to get up and leave the table when the signal hit.

I should be glad that I was “free” from Flash, right? But I felt bad for fooling everyone.

“Why do you look sad?” Peter asked after everyone left.

"I feel bad for fooling everyone. I’m a lousy friend.”

"Sometimes, love, lying is better than telling the truth. You wanted a way to get him out of your foot without hurting him, didn’t you?” I nodded. “Then, he’s going to be a little sad, but if you had said in all letters that you didn’t want to go out with him, he would be much more hurt, wouldn’t he?”

“Maybe … I guess I should have been honest with him from the start.”

“Are you, like, sorry for doing this?”

“Yes. I think I am.”

"Even … for kissing me?”

“What? Kissing was good, I just … “I widened my eyes when I realized what I was saying, hearing a giggle come from his handsome lips. He leaned in a little and left a kiss on my lips before he got up.

"Come on, class will start, and I don’t want to get on my knees in the hallway for being late again.” I took his hand, and still feeling a warm warmth on my lips, we went to attend physics class.

But I still had one doubt that didn’t want to leave my mind.

If it was a lie, why was my heart pounding for real?

summary: After the snap Tony doesn’t want May to be along so they start hanging out like all the time, but then they actually become like...
body:
After the snap Tony doesn’t want May to be along so they start hanging out like all the time, but then they actually become like homies! So when Peter comes back May and Tony just have a bunch of inside jokes and they still hang out and Peters just so confused like he calls Tony and it’s like

“Hey Mr Stark can we work on the iron spider suit today?”

“Kiddo I would love to but me and May are actually going to the bar tonight so”

“….what?”
